text: Ka ce: "Wane abu ne mafi girma ga shaida?" Ka ce: "Allah ne shaida a tsakãnina da tsakaninku. Kuma an yiwo wahayin wannan Alƙur'ãni dõmin in yi muku gargaɗi da shi, da wanda lãbãri ya kai gare shi. Shin lalle ne ku, haƙĩƙa, kunã shaidar cẽwa, lalle ne tãre da Allah akwai wasu abũbuwan bautawa?" Ka ce: "Bã zan yi shaidar (haka) ba." Ka ce: "Abin sani, Shi ne Abin bautãwa Guda kumã lalle ne nĩ barrantacce ne daga abin da kuke yi na shirki
